provenance.snippet: ...we build delightful products for engineering and machine learning teams to deliver their best work. See open roles ‌ Our team spent weeks researching and vetting inference providers. It was a thorough process and we confidently believe Baseten was a clear winner. Baseten has helped us abstract away so much of the complexity of AI model deployments and MLOps.

products.name: Brain MAX
products.description: With the launch of Brain MAX we’ve discovered how addictive speech-to-text is - we use it every day and want it everywhere.

provenance.snippet: ...With the launch of Brain MAX we’ve discovered how addictive speech-to-text is - we use it every day and want it everywhere. But it’s difficult to get reliable, performant, and scalable inference.
...Mahendan Karunakaran , Head of Mobile Engineering Our team spent weeks researching and vetting inference providers. It was a thorough process and we confidently believe Baseten was a clear winner.

provenance_policy: Use only the sources you scraped. If a field is missing, write 'Not disclosed.' Do not infer valuation.
